text.password-hint: The password must consist of at least 8 characters
text.mail-subject: Your access token to your account
text.name: Name
text.user-has-no-videos: User {name} has not booked any videos
text.token-was-renewed: The token was updated because it had expired.

copy-link.text: Use the Copy button to save the link in your clipboard. You can then paste the link into an email using the Paste command ( Ctrl-V ). Next forward the mail to the client.

send-link.text: Depending on the configuration of your browser, an email is generated, ready to be sent to the user.

test-magic-link.text: Test the Magic Link by clicking the Magic Link button. As a result you will be redirected to the login page where the token provided with the link is read out.

p1.header: Take physical classes in the comfort of your own home
